title: Chicken Curry - My Way!
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons of olive oil', '4 large chicken breast fillets, cubed', '1.5 litres of chicken stock', '2 large onions, finely chopped', 'Madras curry powder, according to taste', '2 teaspoons of plain flour', '1 tablespoon of mango chutney', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', '150ml double cream or yogurt', 'Salt and pepper, to taste']
